Ke Ming Kai

Korean: 커밍카이

Country:

China

Full name:
Kē Míngkǎi
Native name:
柯洺楷
Birthday:
May 9, 2001
Age:
23 years old

Introduction

Ke Ming Kai is a Chinese trainee under TOV Entertainment. He is a member of the trainee group YOUTOVE. He gained recognition for his participation in the survival show Starlight Boys.
